Author: iSpartaco
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hiveterminal: Over-the-Counter (OTC) Purchasing Enabled!      The tokens needed to execute orders are — with the current release — bought on the exchange and sold on Hiveterminal for 1 EUR per HVN!   Coming Soon: The Contributor-Gathered Liquidity Pool! Designed to Deliver the Benefits of the OTC Price to Token Holders!  The current solution for OTC purchasing will stay in place until the release of our all-new contributor-gathered liquidity pool, designed to deliver benefits of higher OTC price to our token holders! The HVN-OTC liquidity pool will consist only of tokens, contributed from our token holders and will become the only source for the OTC! Subscribers are going to get proceedings according to the percentage of tokens they contributed to the HVN-OTC liquidity pool, paid quarterly to their Hiveterminal account in FIAT currency.

Author: Saint-loup
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Good news HVN is in the Three Tokens That Should Be Top Fifty https://medium.com/@juliofuertadigital/threetokenstopfifty-ec285b752380  Hiveterminal (HVN) CoinMarketCap rank: #483 CoinGecko rank: #517  Now for something completely different. Hiveterminal is a blockchain platform where businesses can sell their invoices at a discount, getting their funding immediately from investors who hold HVN tokens. After fronting a percentage of the cash, the investors funding these businesses get paid the full amount of the invoice on its due date. Beautiful and simple, and heaven sent by its admirers, HVN has however long flattered to deceive. Until recently it’s been loitering around the low 500s, but there are some very good reasons for this poor price performance — and why things are set to change.   Although it’s been rising up the ranks in recent weeks, Hiveterminal’s non-existent crypto marketing means that, of all the tokens in this list, they are furthest off the pace for a slot in the top 50. Taking an unusual approach to raising awareness, they steadfastly refuse to market to people already interested in cryptocurrencies. Their argument? They are wary of exchanges, see listings as a waste of ICO funds, and HitBTC has been ranked in the top 10 for trading volume for at least 2 years. There’s no need for another, and the long delayed Nauticus listing is expected soon too.  But I still think they’re a top 50 token. Here’s why. Although unorthodox for this industry, their arguments makes sense. Their biggest factoring and invoice financing competitor, Populous (PPT) (ranked #74), has no publicly available metric for platform activity and is reluctant to produce any evidence of invoices sold. Unlike their competitors, Hiveterminal also took the very responsible step of fully documenting the first invoice sale from the perspective of the investor and the small business — they seem to have been the first (and only) factoring token to do this. That’s why confidence is building among investors that Hiveterminal has the potential to grow the fastest of all the tokens on this list. If for no other reason than people are naturally attracted to winners and revenue generating platforms.  Since a major deal fell through last year, which crushed the price beyond belief, the mood among the community has been dark. During this time, Hiveterminal’s CFO Ugur Yildirim has been steadily turning what at first glance looked like an unflashy and deathly boring finance platform into one that is generating an internal rate of return (IRR) of around 40% for its investors. They are all getting paid too.  Yildirim’s efforts have been bolstered by the experienced CTO Dejan Jovanovic, who has been busy working with their long-term partner Adacta to develop a plugin for the MS Dynamics NAV (desktop version) and Dynamics 365 (web-based). This will allow Hiveterminal to communicate not only with the ERPs of Adacta’s clients, but any ERP service based on MS Dynamics. With release of the plugin expected any day now, this will serve as a strong foundation for international expansion after gaining traction in their domestic market of Slovenia.  Meanwhile, the fight for the invoices already posted has been intense, with most getting snapped up in just a few minutes. But with less than 20 invoices raised so far, they will need to start relaxing the entry criteria for small businesses to use the platform. Once the floodgates open, however, things should get interesting very quickly. They already opened up to institutional investment last week, which should attract more businesses looking for funding.  They have made buying HVN easy for non-crypto users too by introducing an over-the-counter (OTC) feature. The price of one HVN is set at EUR 1, and the price on HitBTC is currently around approx EUR 0.01. There’s even a USD/HVN fiat gateway at Livecoin. These seem to be the biggest gifts that Hiveterminal are giving the crypto community, and the prudent are accumulating already. The HVN token is essential to view and access the platform (currently HVN 50) and the investor fee of 1% of the funded invoice is also paid in HVN.  If invoice financing, factoring and audit really are perfect fits for blockchain technology, as argued by the Big 4 (PwC, E&Y, Deloitte and KPMG), then the future looks very bright indeed for this little Balkan beauty. They’ll be having a nose around soon enough, simply because they’re the only factoring platform on CoinMarketCap that’s actually generating significant revenue.

Author: BitMaver
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hiveterminal: Sales and Marketing Update   We have been quiet over the last fortnight for a reason: we did not want to make any big statements before we were sure that our platform is truly up and running the way it supposed to. Instead of making further announcements, we focused our attention on that which is crucial at this stage of a fin-tech startup’s life: on-boarding and product sales... Read more: https://medium.com/hiveterminal/hiveterminal-sales-and-marketing-update-938101f065e3.

Author: LV5ME
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hiveterminal: Project Update As was always the case in our past, we are not taking any shortcuts when it comes to coming out on the market with the best possible product. We are making sure everything is in line for a successful launch and the growth of our business. While the majority of companies that have carried out token sales in the past years have already closed their doors, we are still here, finalizing procedures for an effective launch and making sure the foundations of our business are stable. Hiveterminal’s success story will depend only on how strong the following pillars are: the product, the ability to on-board users, and the working ethics of our employees. Seeing all the work our team has done in the past weeks and days — the majority of it invisible to the public eye — I have no doubt we have these pillars well covered. Here is a short project update.  https://medium.com/hiveterminal/hiveterminal-project-update-1d96e5498d25

Author: LV5ME
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: This will be a really great and top demanded project, and I'm glad that we already have launch dates, although it's not been so long already, but we really want to work with the project, so we are looking forward to it ... Our soft launch will commence at 18.00 hrs (CET) on Monday, 17 September, with the Hive Terminal opening up to investors from all around the world, subject to their completion of our KYC and AML requirements. The second stage of our soft launch will commence on 1 October, which is when the registration process for Slovenian businesses will start, taking their first steps towards cutting costs, automating processes and opening up new sources of financial liquidity. Our official launch — the location and exact timing of the event is still yet to be revealed — will be on 15 October, a month after our soft launch, with invoice sellers and invoice buyers already pre-registered, so the platform can start strongly on day 1.

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: What you're stating here is not completely true. The exact workings of the OTC have not been stated yet, so please don't act as if what you're saying is factual.  Yes, we will set the OTC price how we see fit. As a completely hypothetical example let's say that we set the OTC price to 1$. If that were to happen it would mean that the exchange price is below the 1$. Therefore invoice buyers will have a good reason to buy their HVN on an exchange instead of through OTC. That reason is profit. We believe that if they want to gain as much as they can from using our platform, this includes maximising profit by using the cheaper route.  The OTC is necessary to ensure our success. To achieve it we have to make it as easy as possible tp use our platform, especially for people that are new to crypto. To get comfortable with our platform they will need the OTC solution.

Author: LV5ME
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: That reason is profit. We believe that if they want to gain as much as they can from using our platform, this includes maximising profit by using the cheaper route. Author: cpumechanic
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Oliver Muldoon: Hi, I can confirm that it the HVN-Anticipos Terminal is scheduled for launch in mid-Q3 and that the Hive Europe Terminal is scheduled for launch by the end of Q3. What's happened here is that someone has incorrectly inferred that mid-Q3 must mean 15 August 2018. However, if I said I was in my mid-30s, nobody would assume I am exactly 35 - it's the same logic here. Mid-Q3 means exactly that, and we are being deliberately vague at this point. The exact dates for the launches will be published in a blog and posted to the Hive Project Announcements channel. I hope this is clear. Thank you for checking with the source.

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: We will only be releasing information about any possible exchange listings when the deal is done and HVN is listed. We have this policy because we don't want to risk weakening our position in any negotiations, we hope you understand. Our focus with exchanges is getting listed on reliable, regulated exchanges, where we can be confident in the future success of the exchange. The fees can be enormous and paying them can sometimes be a bad decision, so we are searching for partners who we can trust.

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: We are working on that and have recently shared the news on our Telegram channel that we will implement an over-the-counter solution into our Terminal to make it as easy to use as we possibly can. We think it is important to have an OTC option so that our target audience of SMEs, which most likely has little experience with blockchain and cryptocurrencies/tokens, will find our Terminal to be an easy and straightforward way of solving their liquidity problems.

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear contributors and supporters, here's our CMO Domen Ursic with some great news about Benzinga and how we are raising awareness about Hive Project through our focus on fundamentals!  https://blog.hive-project.net/hive-project-back-on-top-with-benzinga-global-fintech-award-d11ca549b0d4

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Quite the opposite actually. We just won the voting for the Benzinga Fintech Awards, which will give us the opportunity to present our product to an audience full of big players of the fintech industry. Furthermore, it will give us increased visibility outside of the Awards, as Benzinga syndicates content through their partner network, which has about 2 million views per month. We haven't failed in the other aspects either, we are on track with development and we are confident that we will launch the platform in Q2 2018. Not only will our platform come in the next few months, it will also be used as we have a strong partnership with Adacta, whom we are working with for our ERP integration. We could list a lot more, but we recently published a blog with the progress to date and we would strongly encourage you to read it before you come to any conclusions whether Hive Project has failed or not. You can find the blog here: https://blog.hive-project.net/hive-project-progress-to-date-bde7ed89ba95

Author: itshugereally
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: If you say "I believe Hive Propject will be a success", thats an opinion. If you say HVN didnt get listed because exchanges now rarely list coins, is a false statement.  Regarding your link: if you would have read the post made by Verify, you would have realized that Kucoin did not extort more money from them, but postponed the listing date and were too difficult to communicate with. Dont get me wrong, thats VERY bad busines practice by Kucoin, but they did not extort money from them like Hive Project claimed to be.... Furthermore Verify did publish their bad experience with Kucoin, obviously they are not afraid that other exchanges won't deal with them anymore. So obviously other crypto projects have a very different stance than Hive Project does.  I see your POV and agree, but please just state your opinion "Hive will be sucessfull", but don't use false statements and twisted logic to convince yourself and ESPECIALLY others. With that attitude I have a problem with!  And if you sit back and think about all the hints, you would realize what will be clear in the end of 2018, that HVN will fail. It will go like that: they postpone the release of the platform a few months, then create hype with fake news until the team is able to sell their coins, after that huge dump the project will die. I ve seen a few of them like that. Mark my words!

Author: cpumechanic
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: The Hive Project has deals in place with ERP software providers in many markets. Those providers will be integrating the Hive Project platform directly into the ERP software the business users already work in every day. This means that the users will not need to know about or understand blockchain technology or cryptocurrency in order to load their unpaid invoices into the Hive Platform. They will briefly interact with the same ERP software they use everyday and the invoices will be available for buyers to purchase. There are more details of course, and I suggest you join the telegram group and ask for Oliver Muldoon if you would like more specifics. The bottom line is that there should be a very low barrier to entry for businesses to sell their invoices and get the financial liquidity that they need.  In case anyone does not know, ERP stands for enterprise resource planning. In companies, the term "enterprise" is often used to describe business processes that encompass all departments or elements of the business. Basically, this is the critical software that is used to run the business and Hive will be built right into it as another essential piece of daily operations.  So far, they are partnered with Adacta, which covers a 700 billion dollar invoice factoring market consisting of Central and Eastern Europe as well as Russia.  In addition, they have also recently completed deals that will cover the huge Latin American and Turkish markets.  Hive also has important partnerships with Lendoit, InsurePal and FintruX which will help it succeed and shows the seriousness of the project.  For more information, please check out the Hive Project website and official blog:  https://www.hive-project.net/  https://blog.hive-project.net/  The community and Hive team are very active in their Telegram channel:  https://t.me/hiveprojectnet  Please stop in and say hi!  We will be happy to answer any questions that you may have about the project.

Author: iSpartaco
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Found some interesting comments about Hive Project and HVN from a HVN token holder:  •  Real-time credit scoring and triple entry accounting open up several exciting further possibilities for Hive Project.  •  Example: A butcher wants to expand, but current bond issuance procedures are very expensive and time consuming. However, the butcher still wants to expand. The butcher goes to Hive Project and publishes its expansion business plan there, looking to issue bonds worth EUR 10 million in total. With real-time credit scoring and triple entry accounting, any investors would be able to have a real-time insight into how credit worthy the butcher is and how viable its expansion plans actually are. Everything is 100% transparent and immutable because it is on the blockchain.  •  If the butcher requires liquidity, he is limited to the invoices he was waiting to be settled. Let’s say that the total amount would be something like EUR 200,000, that would be peanuts in comparison to the EUR 10 million required for expansion. Therefore, factoring may end up representing just 5% of Hive Project’s income, with the other 95% coming from other revenue streams such as bond issuances, loan issuances and so on.  •  Forget about invoice factoring. Hive Project’s real-time credit scoring and triple entry accounting will serve as a powerful platform for a variety of revenue streams. The figures in the business plan are a joke because they are extremely conservative. So multiply all the revenues by 100x if these guys start issuing bonds.  •  Hive Project hired Gregor Storman from Sberbank, Russia’s biggest bank, and this expansion is the reason why he was hired.  •  Ignore exchanges and just focus on delivering the platform.  •  Start thinking pragmatically. Only one more QUALITY exchange is required.  •  The biggest task will be to continue making deals with ERPs and convincing end users to start using the service.  •  The biggest potential will come from any financial instruments where real-time and flawless credit scoring is required, basically everything Hive Project will be able to provide.

Author: quadrifoglio
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: hive project, road map:  https://hive-project.net/docs/Hive-Project-Platform-business-roadmap-summary.pdf  this is the best way to learn about hive.  ===================================================  POC v2 – 21 December 2017  The Hive Project Proof of Concept v2 (DEMO), the demo version of the Hive Project Platform, is a hosted, improved version of the PoC v1. It gives users the ability to register for an account, verify their e-mail address and interact with the platform as an invoice buyer, invoice seller and the SME’s original customer. It is a fully clickable demonstration of the Hive Project Platform capabilities and interacts with a private instance of the Ethereum blockchain.  Hive Project Platform v1 - Q2 2018  Hive Project Platform will be released to the public. It will allow for invoices to be bought and sold. It will also feature a KYC system and a multi-tier verification system that will allow for different functionalities based on the roles and permissions for each user tier. The Hive Project Platform will feature the first ERP integration, which will allow SMEs to upload their unpaid invoice to the Hive Project Platform using tooling they use on a daily basis and are familiar with.  Hive Project Platform v1.5 – Q3 2018  In the v1.5 release of the Hive Project Platform, the Hive Project Smart Contract System will be extended to allow for additional reporting functionality. The Hive Project Platform will also add tools for invoice buyers that will simplify their portfolio management, such as financial reporting, historical reports, gains and losses, etc.   Hive Project Platform v2 – Q4 2018  The Hive Project Platform will include further ERP integrations in their v2 release. We will also expand on the selection of risk management tools we make available.  Hive Project Platform v2.5 - Q1 2019  The Hive Project Platform will be extended with a mobile app to provide the ability to buy invoices and give liquidity to Hive Project Platform, but on the go. In this release, we also plan on unveiling an advanced reporting system for invoice buyers   ===================================================  2018 will be great for hive, there is no doubt about this.

Author: cryptodalailama
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Jump on HVN train people  it will be EPIC   [$HVN 2017 -> 2018] Hive Project: An Epic Journey and a Fintech Giant in the Making! We’ve had an unbelievable year here at Hive Project HQ, making not only December a month to remember, but also 2017 a year to remember too! When we started our crowd-sale, even our wildest dreams were blown away when we released our DEMO version a mere 6 months later — with a strong business lined up and ready to be plugged in too! And when reading through our Telegram channel and social media, it becomes increasingly clear how much strong progress we have made in becoming a real fintech giant to be reckoned with!  Ending 2017 in Style: A DEMO Revealed — Backed up with First Business Deals!  It has been an epic journey. Since our award-winning ICO, Hive Project has progressed from promise and potential to becoming a recognized and trusted fintech brand with a DEMO version of the platform to show, but there is still no end in sight to our progress. My team and I are still working all-nighters to deliver the first ever blockchain based platform to give SMEs worldwide fast and low-cost liquidity. And on time too, just as we promised. We just keep on delivering: our Proof of Concept (PoC) in Las Vegas and the DEMO version a week ago being two examples!  The fact that we have been focusing solely on the product and ensuring its long-term future by backing it up with business deals is, in my opinion, the best investment in Hive Project’s bright future! There is no time for bulls**it here. We are here to deliver and create long-term value for our contributors! And that is why it gives me such great pleasure to get so much feedback, emails and phone calls of support and praise from SMEs (debtors) and investors (factors) from all over the world! This confirms that we are on the right path to achieving success, and we will continue to work just as hard in the future. For those asking about how you can test out our DEMO, you can play around with it HERE! As my co-founder and CTO, Dejan Jovanovic, explained, the Hive Project DEMO is a fully clickable demonstration of the Hive Project Platform’s capabilities, and interacts with a private instance of the Ethereum blockchain. With added functionalities, drastically improved performance and an intuitive user experience, I believe we have made a crucial first step towards ensuring the Hive Project Platform’s long-term viability.  And when adding our first ERP deal (!) and the FUNDS (!) committed in our “Jump-Start Liquidity Pool” to the equation, it is now becoming crystal clear that 2018 will be HUGE for Hive Project and our amazing community of contributors!  2018: SCALING UP TO A €2.5 TRILLION MARKET!  With our development team working wonders on a daily basis, we have been keeping pace with the business side too. We made our TELEGRAM ONLY ANNOUNCEMENT on our ERP deal just last week — going public with Hive Project’s integration into a leading regional ERP provider for SMEs. We are delighted that Adacta (https://www.adacta.si/) has seen what Hive Project Platform can bring to the table for their customers, and that they will fully integrate us into their systems. With this agreement now signed, sealed and delivered, we are already working on other ERP providers to follow. For now, however, we will be making Slovenia, Croatia, Serbia, Germany, the Czech Republic, the UK and Russia (!) our first go-to markets when delivering our platform during the period Q2 to Q3 of 2018 — and there will be more countries to come!  Tomaz Volk, Founder and Managing Partner of Adacta Holding: “Hive Project’s blockchain-based liquidity-providing platform is a unique solution for SMEs around the world. It is a truly revolutionary product and we are looking forward to implementing it into our systems and making it available to our clients.” For more information about Adacta, please check here: https://www.adacta.si/  With a powerful business backing up our development, we are surer than ever that we will deliver exactly what we promised — and create long-term value for our contributors in the process! The numbers are there for everyone to see. And we believe that that the targets set in the Business Roadmap Summary are eminently realistic and achievable.  Let there be no doubt about it. Our first go-to markets have incredible potential, including powerhouses of the European economy, and we will do our best to continue delivering as we have done so often until now!  With 5.67 million small and medium sized enterprises (SMEs) in Russia (!) and an annual turnover of USD 2.5 trillion for the companies in our first go-to markets alone (!!), we have laid strong foundations for our success and scaling up in 2018! Although we made some strong steps toward success in 2017, I am certain that we will make giant leaps forward in 2018, and make Hive Project a fintech unicorn in the process! Our team is extremely dedicated and highly motivated, and our amazing community continues to back us up. So, here’s to making 2018 a year of success for Hive Project!

Author: fastfalcon94
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I'm on the Telegram chat but I'm more of an observer. I more or less ignore everyone's posts and just scroll down focusing on stuff from Hive (Oliver Muldoon). This is what I gathered from his posts...  - They were supposed to release the business plan 12/15 but it's not quite ready yet. They would rather get it 100% correct than release it just to hit a deadline. This is what caused a lot of the drama as it goes against the "always deliver on promise" statement Hive is known for.  - The demo version of the product is still 100% on track for the 12/21 release.  - They suspect Q1 2018 is when they will go live  - No new exchanges yet, but it will eventually happen. Oliver re-iterated that hitbtc is fine for now. Personally I have bought some on hitbtc and livecoin. I like livecoin better but hitbtc has more volume and its easier to get it cheaper there.  Overall I'm happy with this coin. I'm not a huge investor in it, but that more or less boils down to my lack of money:) I have around 12k coins. I could get out now with 2-3x gains, but I'm staying in. I like that there are actually faces behind the coin and known developers which I think is important. I'm excited to see what comes out on the 21st. I think it has a lot of potential especially with the ERP.  Now I'm going to try and do some math which may or may not be right They stated in one of their blog posts:      So to me 700 Billion Euros is $822,444,000,000 USD. I'm assuming this is the amount of money tied up in invoices in a year? If we divide this by 365 it means $2,253,271,232 is tied up in invoices each day. With 375,000,000 coins it would mean each coin would have to be about $6 to compensate for this. Obviously these are rough numbers. I don't fully understand how the HVN token is used in all this. Perhaps the same token can be used and re-used several times a day to settle invoices. That would mean the price per coin could be lower. Then on the other hand not all 375 million coins are going to be available. Some will be stored away in investor's wallets so I suspect that will drive up the price. And perhaps the 700 billion Euros mentioned is just potential market they could pull in. To me it's not real clear if with the ERP deal if they can already expect that piece of the market or if that is just best case scenario that they could achieve if they work hard enough.

Author: fastfalcon94
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I just picked up some more of this coin. I like seeing active developers who put their face behind their coin. To me that's the most important thing. Excited to see beta coming out in the next few weeks. Just trying to predict future prices. If it really is a 3 trillion dollar market, lets say hvn takes just 5% of that market. At any given day with the 375,000,000 coin supply the price per coin would need to be around $1.09.  ((3,000,000,000,000 * 0.05)/365)/375000000 = $1.09  However that assumes all the coins in circulation are being used. Really some of them will be off the market in MEW wallets. So I suspect the price could be much higher; even higher if they take over a larger percentage of the market. As long as the dev team keeps chugging a long I suspect a coin that is currently ~ 5 cents could create some 20x plus returns in the near future. To me this seems like a worthy investment.

Author: KLN_IT
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I agree MEW is the best option for holding you HVN tokens as well as many other ERC 20 tokens.  I would also suggest hooking up a nano s through the MEW function they have built into the site.  It's super simple to use , nothing changes really...only difference is the nano s has to be plugged into the computer in order to send out tokens vs going through MEW itself which tokens can leave with just a private key.  IF that private key is compromised, well, you could possibly lose your tokens.  At least it adds an extra layer of security before leaving your MEW Wallet.  For $100 something bucks to protect thousands or even millions, that is a no brainer really.  With all the damn hacking and theft going on, I'd suggest not to keep private keys in emails or on your phone or anything.  Don't be that guy!! Save your wallet address which is open source to all anyways...and check your balance on etherscan.  I wouldn't be clicking any links or any of that.  Check ad make sure your wifi is protected as well.  Don't get on the airports wifi either... i heat that is a huge mistake.  I had a buddy of mine lose 300 VERI getting on an airport wifi along with all 3000 populous tokens. Gone in a few clicks..the threat is real guys...please make the effort to protect your hard earned crypto.

Author: Bouli
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: The security is as good as the weakest link. And sadly humans are the weak link....storing private keys en pass phrases online....or on a easy accesible computer. Just store your keys and so OFFLINE, on paper or on a offline usb stick.  I don't trust a nano ledger, beceasue they hold on your private keys.... like exchanges do also.

Author: SirBurton
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I ABSOLUTELLY AGREE.  HitBtc is a troll heaven , an exchange that can only do harm to a company's/coin's credibility. I am a HVN believer and investor , and it is frustrating to see such price manipulations on HitBTC.  The volume most times is low , the buy and sell orders are forming nothing but walls , forcing the small investors to either buy high or sell low.  Its the worst thing guys , the worst thing..  Yesterday it was a freak show , no one really cared about the news on that exhange. Everybody started dumping 20 minutes prior to any news getting released. So , anyone that states that " the news were not worthy and thats why the coin lost 30% " is either a liar , a fudster or a day trader and not a real investor.  Yesterdays news were AWESOME. But , many people cant and wont care about the long term sustainability of the company and simply follow the " buy the rumor - sell the news " rule of the speculators guide book.  Thats what it is guys , and it happens to all coins.  Short term profits and small time "investors" who seek to earn a buck or two and buy a lambo in a week.  It is trully a pitty. Hoping the best for HVN team and URGE them to add ONE more exchange. Bittrex at least. And NOT Binance...  which is 10x worse in manipulation tactics than HitBtc.

Well, it’s just days now before we take the grand stage at The Future of Money and Technology Summit on 4 December, taking our first step into what we are certain will be A December to Remember — a month of several strong announcements on both the development and business side that will determine our future success. A brief preview of the days ahead While our CFO & Hive Project board member Ugur Yildirim discusses the future of Hive Project with industry leaders, the rest of us will be attracting further positive attention and global visibility by keeping FinTech & cryptocurrency founders, executives & traders up to date with all our latest progress and developments at the main exhibitor booth in the conference hall. Up, Up & Away So, this is it. The time has finally come. As I write this, we are boarding a plane to San Francisco, which is where we will be writing our next blog. We will be joined by the very best and brightest visionaries in the financial and FinTech worlds at the summit, with the global media in attendance. And this is where we start our amazing journey towards what we are convinced will be a strong and successful 2018.    HVN is so much undervaluated - we will see 2018 is HVN year

Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: With Gregor now putting the finishing touches to our business plan, we can reassure you that it will be up on the website as soon as possible for our community to see. For those of you who are looking for our old whitepaper, which relates to the ICO, you can download and read it HERE. And last, but by no means least, we have added a link to our Github to our footer — again making it as easy as possible for potential contributors to see first-hand how our developers are progressing.  In other news …  I took some time off from my community management duties on Thursday evening to help spread the word about Hive Project among those whose words are often trusted the most. The venue was Deutsche Bank’s head offices in Berlin, where I discussed Hive Project with a large group of spine surgeons from Helios International, the second largest private medical group in Germany. With some bankers also in attendance, it felt great to talk about Hive Project in Berlin’s financial heartland. I fielded several insightful and perceptive questions afterwards, and was pleasantly surprised by the high level of interest in what we are trying to achieve here. We certainly have some new fans.

Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: [$HVN] A December to remember!  Marketing isn’t something we’ve talked about much since the completion of our award-winning ICO. And, yes of course, we could certainly do more to attract attention to our revolutionary product. But it is important to understand that, without strong development also in place, the net result would be artificial hype, high peaks and even lower dips. Instead, we have been following up on the promises we have made to deliver, and have been focusing all our efforts on getting the Hive Project Platform up and running! And that’s a big reason why we consistently hit our targets and milestones. Every time this happens, we show the fruits of our efforts to our community and other world-class experts, cryptocurrency founders, executives and traders — take, for example, the unveiling of our PROOF OF CONCEPT in Las Vegas, which brought the crypto-community to its feet!   We are thrilled by all the support we have received and the trust we are given every single day. And all of our team are working flat out to ensure this faith is justified. Not only are we consistently talked about in the same breath as global industry leaders, we are also steadily consolidating our growing reputation through various articles, mentions and interviews in the media for the “old” economy — giving us visibility among small businesses in the region. A December to remember!  Despite having being relatively restrained until now with our marketing efforts for Hive Project, we will be looking to spread awareness and increase our coverage in the media in the days and weeks ahead. There are just a few days now remaining until we take the global stage at The Future of Money and Technology Summit on December 4, where the best and brightest visionaries in the financial and FinTech worlds will come together for a conference with global media coverage to discuss the future of cryptocurrencies.  While our CFO & Hive Project board member Ugur Yildirim discusses the future of Hive Project with industry leaders, sharing the stage with JP Morgan and Capital One, among others, the rest of us will be attracting further positive attention and global visibility by keeping FinTech & cryptocurrency founders, executives & traders up to date with all our latest progress and developments at the main exhibitor booth in the conference hall. AND STRONG ANNOUNCEMENTS WILL BE MADE THERE TO THE CRYPTO AND FINTECH MEDIA IN ATTENDANCE!  With some even more amazing and newsworthy content on its way, things are once again shaping up for us to be the centre of media attention this month. After winning at CoinAgenda in Barcelona and successfully completing our ICO, history looks set to repeat itself in terms of the column inches we get. Those recent successes attracted coverage from media outlets such as Nasdaq, Finance Magnates, Econotimes, The-Blockchain, and CoinSpectator, to name just a few, helping us to “level up” in terms of our progress as a FinTech brand.  “STRONG ANNOUNCEMENTS WILL BE MADE THERE TO THE CRYPTO AND FINTECH MEDIA IN ATTENDANCE!” As always, all the news you need to hear will be available first on our Hive Project Announcements channel. If you’re not a member there, you won’t be the first to hear about our updates. So, join up now and stay tuned for the truly festive season we have in store.  HVN X20  in dec!   Remember my words

Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear community of contributors and supporters, we have continued to boost our recognition and overall presence among SMEs in the CEE region. As our first market, it is vital that we establish powerful levels of general recognition and trust there. We are therefore delighted to share with you an interview by our CEO, Jure Soklic, which was published at http://bankazapodjetnike.si portal (direct translation: a bank for SMEs). Organised by Gorenjska Banka, which is one of the largest Slovenian banks, and other partners, we are wasting no time when it comes to connecting with our user base. Read more here!  https://blog.hive-project.net/interview-hive-project-a-revolutionary-solution-for-smes-around-the-world-411ebc1189b4

Author: hrbt
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: A revolutionary solution for SMEs around the world  In the run up to our attendance at yet another prestigious international conference, this time in San Francisco, where the spotlight will yet again be on Hive Project, we have continued to boost our recognition and overall presence among SMEs in the CEE region too. As our first market, it is absolutely crucial that we establish powerful levels of general recognition and trust among SMEs in the region. And, as you can see from our progress to date, we have already made huge inroads. Now, however, it is time to step things up a notch.  We are therefore delighted to share with you an interview by our CEO, Jure Soklic, which was published at (direct translation: a bank for SMEs). Organised by Slovenian bank Gorenjska banka and other partners, we are wasting no time when it comes to connecting with our user base.  We are thrilled about the recognition we are getting from key financial institutions in the region on a daily basis, and we are sure you would agree that this is yet further evidence that we are well and truly here to stay. Our CEO shared his thoughts about the future of Hive Project, drawing attention to precisely how our platform will solve the liquidity problems encountered by small businesses. In addition to helping build general awareness of Hive Project, Jure’s interview has been included as a key story in their mailing list — reaching over 20,000 small businesses in Slovenia! Those of our contributors who can understand Slovenian can read the interview with Jure HERE. However, for the majority who don’t understand the language, we have provided a translation into English below. Onwards and upwards!  Hive Project: a Revolutionary Solution for SMEs Around the World With cryptocurrencies and tokens now the buzzwords on everyone’s lips in the world of finance, the prices of bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are skyrocketing. And there has been a similar rise in the number of crypto companies on the market that issued tokens in exchange for funds raised during their Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs).  Although there are several credible companies on the market with a focus on doing things the right way, there are also an increasing number of fraudsters that threaten to damage the whole industry. The recent widespread enthusiasm for all things crypto related has been a popular breeding ground for scammers and unscrupulous characters. They take advantage of people with next to no knowledge of crypto with promises of vast sums of money to be made. However, with either no product or a product with no value, these millions in raised funds do nothing to sustain the token’s long-term value. “Unfortunately, where there is money to be made, there will also be individuals looking to take advantage of people who have not done their due diligence,” explained Jure Soklic, CEO of Hive Project, a fintech company that will be launching an online factoring platform soon. The Hive Project Platform is based on blockchain technology, and awareness of its benefits are only just becoming known to the general public. These advantages include a continuously growing list of data records that are linked by a blockchain network. When doing that, you get new blocks and new block programme codes, which are secured cryptographically, checked by multiple users, and are dependent on the information contained in previous blocks in the chain.  Jure Soklic and I both agree that there is a pressing need to help the general public learn more about cryptocurrencies, the ICO fundraising process and blockchain technology in general, which serves as the basis for many of the products proposed. There is also a popular mistaken belief that tokens will always rise in price. It is crucial to remember that any investment in blockchain technology projects comes with risk. You could lose everything you invest, so a cautious and prudent approach is advised.  The Hive Project team is international in scope, comprising financial experts, platform developers, marketing and communications experts from all over the world. Although headquartered in Ljubljana, Slovenia, part of the development team are based abroad. “All key decisions are taken here,” Jure Soklic explained, “and that will continue to remain the case”. Hive Project’s ambitions and potential for growth have earned the trust of over 2,200 contributors, with just under USD 9 million raised in funding. Q: You won Best ICO of 2017 at CoinAgenda Global. How did you go about convincing the judging panel?  The judging panel, which comprised several global blockchain experts, were persuaded by the concept behind Hive Project and the proposed product, the platform itself. They took the view that the team had the right blend to fulfil potential for substantial growth. The critical factors, however, were the platform’s global nature and its ability to open up affordable invoice financing solutions to small businesses around the world. The judging panel took various factors into consideration. These included the strength of the team and the marketing strategy in place — we also delivered a live presentation, which was crucial. The spotlight fell, in particular, on our developers since technical expertise was considered a critical factor. In Barcelona we were up against several new blockchain projects, but our team’s international experience proved to be (and remains) a big advantage for us.  Q: Your platform is based on platform technology. What kind of problems does it solve? Hive Project will open up a new source of liquidity to small and medium sized enterprises (SMEs) around the world. To be more precise, we will be changing the way they get access to liquidity. Using blockchain technology to automate the factoring process will give small companies entry to a market — and all the associated benefits — that has until now simply been too time consuming and costly, leaving a vast market unserved. The credit data we collect will give us the opportunity to offer credit scoring services on SMEs to invoice purchasers, which will be made available for them to buy so that they have all the information they need to assess their risk appetite. This will be launched prior to the launch of our peer-to-peer (P2P) lending phase.  What will the Hive Project Platform focus on? Our platform’s key assets will be its speed, process automatization and transparency. Since user-friendliness will be paramount, SMEs and liquidity investors will only need to carry out just a few simple steps to get up and running. As our Proof of Concept (PoC) demonstrates, the Hive Project Platform is the answer to the lengthy and complicated procedures we have become so accustomed to in the so-called “old” economy. When will your platform be available to the market?  Three months after our successful campaign, we presented our Proof of Concept at CoinAgenda Global in Las Vegas, and we are now working on the beta version of the Hive Project Platform. Although we are setting ourselves almost impossible deadlines, the team has hit every milestone promised. We will have presented the updated beta version of the platform by the end of the year, and we will launch the platform in early 2018. How many people are there in the team, where are your premises and where do you see yourself being located in a few years from now? The Hive Project team is international in scope, comprising financial experts, platform developers, and marketing and communications experts from all over the world. Full details of our team can be found here (insert link to team page). Although headquartered in Ljubljana, Slovenia, part of the development team are based abroad. However, all key decisions are taken here and that will continue to remain the case. You raised money through an Initial Coin Offering (ICO). How much did you raise? We concluded our campaign on 14 August this year, raising almost USD 9 million in the process. This was a huge success and we fully understand that we now have a responsibility and duty to deliver on what we promised over the long term.  What is an ICO? “ICO” is an acronym for Initial Coin Offering. It is a way of raising of money, and is a similar concept to the more traditional IPO. In our ICO, we sold cryptocurrency tokens to contributors in exchange for funding. The tokens issued, which are called Hive Tokens (HVN), can be used by the contributors to trade on crypto exchanges all over the world. Many are predicting that cryptocurrencies will disappear — but that blockchain technology will stay.  Well, blockchain technology is already changing the world, in much the same way as the Internet revolutionised everything we do. However, in the early days of the world wide web, we had little idea what lay in store and so I would be hesitant to make any predictions now. And when it comes to cryptocurrencies, since we are talking about startups, the future is even more ambiguous. What is clear, however, is that the cryptocurrency issuers that deliver on their key objectives and products will survive. That’s why we are doing everything in our power to ensure that our platform is delivered as promised and that it will be used by small businesses around the world.  What does blockchain technology have in store for us over the next 10 years? Will it make life easier for people and businesses? Yes, both. But not only that — blockchain technology will be used by the public sector too. Take the health sector, for example. Have big companies already integrated blockchain technology into their day-to-day business? Can you, as a small company but with a very innovative idea, offer them something more? Some leading global companies, including banks, are already testing blockchain technology in their day-to-day processes. But progress doesn’t happen overnight. When it comes to innovation, even the biggest companies in the world need start-ups to help out — that is the fastest way to develop, test and rollout any high-quality product. Slovenia is one of the leading countries in this industry, and so we always see many familiar faces at the blockchain tech conferences we attend.  Does the general public understand what blockchain technology is and what the differences between cryptocurrencies are? It is true that the general public does not have enough knowledge about cryptocurrencies, and we support any efforts made, whether it be from newspaper articles, lecturers or round tables, to get people educated about blockchain technology and help spread awareness. There is not enough open discussion about the high risks involved with buying cryptocurrencies. As the old saying goes, all the glitters is not gold. The biggest financial institutions are investing in this new technology. It’s a hot topic all over the world, including Slovenia. Are there any legal or other obstacles to overcome? Do you enjoy the support of regulators? Thus far, we have not experienced any legal or regulatory issues, and we support any efforts made by legislators to regulate this new industry. Are we Slovenians really pioneers in the crypto-world?  Well, perhaps not quite pioneers — there are so many great projects from various countries all over the world. However, the media spotlight on some Slovenian companies has been particularly high. We hope that, despite Slovenia’s relative small size, we can show the world that we can come up with some big solutions.  More and more outspoken and successful investors from the financial world are issuing public warnings about the dangers of cryptocurrencies, with some even calling them pyramid schemes. When there aren’t enough people who want to buy bitcoin to push price up, everything will collapse. Why have we seen so many warnings like this in recent months? Where there is money, you will also find unscrupulous and dishonest people who want to take advantage of naive people or those who have not fully researched the industry. I would advise anyone looking to trade currencies to take all necessary precautions to ensure that their decisions have a solid basis and rationale behind them. Take care not to let greed influence a rational decision. Wise investors allocate only a very small part of their portfolio to crypto and disperse their investments widely to mitigate risk.  It looks like that the crypto industry attracts scammers who want to take advantage of people who are naive and lack knowledge about crypto. How big is this problem? It is the responsibility of law enforcement institutions to deal with scammers and other undesirable characters. And it is crucial that we all focus on our responsibilities — towards the media, other companies and the authorities. We would urge those looking to purchase tokens to take time to do their research. Thoroughly investigate the project, leave no stone left unturned and look into the people behind it. We have been moving at such a rapid pace in such a short time, and we’re all so busy, I don’t really have the time to scrutinise every project out there in detail. Almost all of my time is dedicated to Hive Project. Will bitcoin or any other cryptocurrency ever overtake fiat currency or at least become its equivalent?  That is a difficult question to answer because this decision is in the hands of the central banks, and the likelihood of this happening will vary from country to country. However, Christine Lagarde, executive director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) delivered a recent speech in which she said that cryptocurrencies will become a reality in the decades to come and will complement national currencies.

Author: hrbt
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: When people will read - they will understand future of HVN for all of us - price will follow   Community update #4 — Exciting times ahead! Well, it’s been almost 2 weeks now since I took over responsibility for Hive Project’s community management and I am delighted with what I have seen. With contributors and supporters from all over the world, and from all walks of life, it has been a valuable and intriguing experience getting to know you all. Thank you for all the offers of support and help I have received since taking on the position. Many of you have helped welcome new arrivals, assisted with general questions and boosted our efforts in raising awareness — I’m grateful for all of that. It’s also been great to hear from small business owners who are also token holders, and how keen you all are to start using the Hive Project Platform when it is launched. We have a real mix of good people in our community, and that’s what I like to see — regardless of your reasons for getting involved in Hive Project, I will do my very best to get you any info you need and help with any Hive Project related questions you may have.  Weekly overview So, we’ve had yet another week packed with great news here at Hive Project HQ. Starting the week the right way, our CTO, Dejan Jovanovic, gave some exciting insights into our product development progress (you can read the full in-depth interview HERE). As you will see, Dejan and his development team are dedicated to giving our users the ultimate user experience. But did we stop there? No. On Tuesday, we announced our partnership with Lendoit, which promises to be a real win-win-win for Hive Project, Lendoit and our many contributors (check out our Twitter announcement HERE). Then, continuing to push ahead, on Wednesday, our CEO published his review of Hive Project’s first three months and everything we have achieved so far. As you can see, it is clear that the solid foundations required to take Hive Project up to the next level are now in place, and we are well and truly here to stay. The future for Hive Project looks bright — both over the short and long term.  With our CEO making his statement on the progress made during our first quarter, Domen and Gal (our CMO & Platform Delivery Lead) took to the airwaves on the Neocash Radio podcast to discuss our ICO campaign, our development progress and the Hive Project Platform itself with the Neocash host, Pedro. Based in Manchester, New Hampshire, the Neocash Radio podcast is one of the best known crypto podcasts in the world, and we are looking forward to engaging with their knowledgeable and shrewd audience. The podcast will be up to listen to late this evening (around 00.00 hrs UTC), and we will post links on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Reddit, Bitcointalk and, of course, our official Telegram channel.  Ramping up our marketing efforts! With our development team buried away and 100% focused on getting the Hive Project Platform up and running, the rest of the team have been focused on marketing — we understand the importance of consolidating trust and, above all, visibility, among our key target audiences: small businesses and other future users of the platform, existing and future HVN token holders, and the crypto-world too. As you will have no doubt noticed, we are monitoring all of our key channels closely, giving all existing and potential contributors frequent and consistent updates and (very close to) real-time responses to enquiries. We will continue providing you with the reports and good news you need in the weeks ahead. As you know, Hive Project’s successes have already yielded some special treatment, and we have been allocated yet another booth at yet another prestigious international conference. This time we will be at The Future of Money & Technology Summit in San Francisco, the mecca of the fintech industry.  This will boost our overall presence and put us in the spotlight once again. This event is only two weeks away and promises to be just as exciting as CoinAgenda Global in Las Vegas, when we reached USD 1 million in 24-hour trading volume. One thing is absolutely certain. Our short and long-term futures are very bright indeed. As always, keep in touch with Hive Project on our TELEGRAM channel for the latest news and updates from our team. We look forward to hearing from you!

Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear community of contributors & supporters. Hive Project won “Best ICO 2017” at CoinAgenda in Barcelona. One CoinAgenda Global conference later, we have a working Proof of Concept. After its successful unveiling at CoinAgenda Global in Las Vegas, our CTO, Dejan, shares his views on our remarkable progress so far! https://medium.com/hiveproject-net/interview-dejan-jovanovic-hive-project-team-will-deliver-a-state-of-the-art-product-and-a-user-6ccf20ac966f

Author: xiao2017
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Guys this is great!  Thanks for sharing so much quality info   Q: Speaking of the Proof of Concept, what lays ahead? What changes do you plan to introduce? The current version of the Proof of Concept is a Meteor application that users need to download to their computer and run to test. At this stage of development, it takes a user with some technical know-how to do that. However, in the next iteration of the Proof of Concept, which is scheduled to be released by the end of the year, that paradigm will be changed.  We’re already designing sitemaps, wireframes and user flows for the Hive Project platform and it is likely that we will provide that in the form of a mock-up application that allows our design & development teams to enter a rapid prototyping cycle. This Hive Project Platform application will become an integral component in the roadmap for both of those teams and will give the Hive Project community an insight into our day-to-day work. In order to demo both sides of the platform, users will be able to register and choose whether they would like to take on the role of invoice buyer or invoice seller. We expect some users will in fact use the platform in both roles, and so we need to give them the ability to test all the functionalities on both.  Q: What are the biggest technical challenges Hive Project has to master? The biggest challenge that Hive Project has to overcome is the performance of the public blockchain. The current delay on the public blockchain is at least 17 seconds, which is the time required to create a new block. This is not acceptable from a user perspective and this is one of the reasons why we are looking at technologies such as Tindermint or Hyperledger to tackle this.   Q: How many people are involved with Hive Project Platform development at this point & what are your plans for scaling? Currently we have a team of 5 resources as part of our delivery team, focusing on areas such as project management, UX designer, developers and QA. Currently I am planning to keep the team small and agile, but there is potential in the future to add more development resources for additional products and DAPPs, such as, for example, a mobile investors app.  Q: You spend most of your waking hours building the Hive Project Platform. If you had to single out its most important feature, what would it be? The first thing that comes to mind is that it needs to be an amazing user experience. It must be incredibly easy to engage with, not only for the SMEs seeking financing but also for the invoice buyers during the peer-to-peer lending phase. The Hive Project Team will deliver a high-tech product that is complemented by great design. And if the experience — from uploading the invoice to the Hive Project Platform to invoice settlement — is straightforward and runs smoothly, then the users of the platform are much more likely to return again and again.

Author: OMuldoon
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hi, thanks for the question! We recently premiered our working Proof of Concept at CoinAgenda in Las Vegas to rapt attendees who were amazed at the progress we'd made in such a short time. It has already been deployed to our GitHub. The link is here for you to check it out for yourself:  https://github.com/HiveProjectLtd/HivePoC  The current version of the Proof of Concept is a Meteor application that users need to download to their computer and run to test. At this stage of development, it takes a user with some technical know-how to do that. However, in the next iteration of the Proof of Concept, which is scheduled to be released by the end of the year, that paradigm will be changed. We’re already designing sitemaps, wireframes and user flows for the Hive Project platform and it is likely that we will provide that in the form of a mock-up application that allows our design & development teams to enter a rapid prototyping cycle. This Hive Project Platform application will become an integral component in the roadmap for both of those teams and will give the Hive Project community an insight into our day-to-day work.  We welcome any feedback you may have after taking a look. Our ship sets sail in Q1/2018, which is when we will start funding small businesses with our HVNX fund. Please let us know if you have any further questions!

Author: OMuldoon
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hello, thanks for your comment! Our strategy to get SMEs on board will be to integrate ERPs – this represents the pinnacle of our go-to market strategy – and this also addresses the problems associated with the network effect and adoptability. We will be able to get thousands of SMEs and invoices on the system in one go, putting your concerns about volume to rest almost immediately. Lenders and auditors will be able to use the data for audits, when making financing decisions and to improve the accuracy of their credit scoring processes. They will appreciate that the data is stored on blockchain and is therefore immutable and easy to access. The reason why ERPs are our entrance point is because they already have vast user pools with lots of data, are trusted, and it is also possible to integrate the platform with supply chain systems. This leads to further possibilities for automating the process.  As you will see, it makes more sense to go down this route rather than attempt to win customers that are already there for us. Once these deals are in place, SME owners will be able to get the liquidity they need through a simple click in their accounting program. And that is why we are working around the clock to create the system needed to achieve that. Our platform is in high demand among ERPs worldwide and they cannot wait for us to deliver on what we have promised. I hope that helps explain things

Author: OMuldoon
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hello, I understand your point. However, we believe that the future success of the platform is dependent on strong foundations being built. We have done that in a variety of ways.  We have been making tremendous efforts to get the word out there about Hive Project, and we're always looking to improve and communicate our message. Following on from our CEO, Jure's, appearance on the panel at the Finance cryptocurrency conference in Slovenia, one of our first markets in Q1 2018, we received widespread media coverage in the national press there. As we want to be seen primarily among SMEs and investors, we are channelling all our efforts in this direction — with interviews and articles in the regional business media. This has been critical to paving the way for our successful penetration of that market when we commence funding. As you may know, the team recently returned from CoinAgenda in Las Vegas too, where we had an exhibitor booth and unveiled our Proof of Concept (PoC) to rapt attendees – being there was important in terms of building our reputation as a global fintech brand. Our PoC is available on our GitHub to play with. We will also be attending The Future of Money & Technology Summit in San Francisco, the biggest stage in the Mecca of the fintech industry, in December. There we will have another exhibitor booth, and our CFO, Ugur, will be a panellist. With previous conferences attracting the attention of media giants such as USA TODAY, TechCrunch, MarketWatch, CoinDesk, Gigaom and WePay, we believe this will serve as a huge boost to our global brand recognition efforts. We also have a thriving Telegram channel, where questions are answered in real time and open discussions are held about all things Hive Project related.  We also had lots to discuss with our host Pedro from http://neocashradio.com in a recent interview, again generating awareness of how blockchain will disrupt the invoice financing industry. The podcast should be available tonight and will be posted as a bonus segment in special interviews with various leaders in finance and economics, technology, blockchain, cryptocurrency, encryption, FinTech, and more. It will also be made available on iTunes / Soundcloud / Stitcher / YouTube / Google Play & iHeartRadio  We believe that coin price appreciation will come with real volumes and real supply and demand. With ready capital to be deployed through our platform in the form of our HVNX fund in Q1/2018, we will attract ERPs and SMEs to get up and running straight away. And the benefits are reciprocal because we then gain the data we need to lift the Hive Project up to the next level. Our CFO has been hard at work getting that all in place. We're the Best ICO of 2017, have a solid product, solid team, hit our milestones, have our Proof of Concept publicly available to be checked out and tested ... we will leave you decide You can see the work we are doing. We are all expecting these efforts - focusing on the real substance of the business - to bear fruit. Please let me know if you have any other concerns.

Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I like that part    Here to stay — a leading financial institution in the New Economy  Our PoC announcement represented the fulfilment of one our key promises. We have now proven that we are on the very cusp of making a real-life business contribution that will revolutionise the way small businesses around the world get the liquidity they need. This will only be underlined with our PoC2, adding some visibility and making sure that the business side is in step with the progress made by our developers — transforming Hive Project into a source of liquidity to be reckoned with in the new economy.   We will be pressing on relentlessly in that direction and I am incredibly excited about the announcement we will be making next week!  And don’t forget! Hive Project will be taking its rightful place alongside the best and brightest visionaries in the financial world on 4 December in San Francisco. Our CFO, Ugur Yildirim, will be representing Hive Project as a panellist in the company of distinguished names such as JPMorgan Chase, Capital One, 500 Startups, MasterCard as well as other leading lights in the fintech industry.  So, it’s not just the long-term future that looks bright — the days and weeks ahead promise to be full of exciting news and progress too!

Author: OMuldoon
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hi, we definitely take your comments on board, and we are always looking for ways to help communicate our message. We are already making big strides in this direction. Following on from our CEO, Jure's, appearance on the panel at the Finance cryptocurrency conference in Slovenia, one of our first markets in Q1 2018, we received widespread media coverage in the national press there. As we want to be seen primarily among SMEs and investors, we are channelling all our efforts in this direction — with interviews and articles in the regional business media. This has been critical to paving the way for our successful penetration of that market when we commence funding. As you may know, the team just returned from CoinAgenda in Las Vegas too, where we had an exhibitor booth and unveiled our PoC to attendees – being there was important in terms of building our reputation as a global fintech brand. We will also be attending The Future of Money & Technology Summit, the biggest stage in the Mecca of the fintech industry, in December. There we will have another exhibitor booth, and our CFO, Ugur, will be a panellist. With previous conferences attracting the attention of media giants such as USA TODAY, TechCrunch, MarketWatch, CoinDesk, Gigaom and WePay, we believe this will serve as a huge boost to our global brand recognition efforts. These are just some of the ways we are looking to 'get the word out there' but we are constantly working hard to increase awareness.

Author: OMuldoon
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hello, thanks for your question. So, to explain how HVN tokens fit in with the Hive Project Platform, we will be financing smaller invoices with HVN, which gives us more circulation and a positive impact on the price. HVN will also be used as the 'fuel' in other currency transactions (approx. 1% of the invoice value), opening up another source of demand for HVN. Moreover, all the services on the platform, including company audits, credit scores, risk report services, etc., will be paid in the HVN token equivalent of the fiat price. The company’s profits will be used to create treasury shares through buybacks to support the HVN token supply on the market as the product is used more. It is reasonable to assume that increased usage of HVN and the decrease in the amount available will increase the price. If, for example, an audit report costs EUR 2,000, that would be paid for in the HVN equivalent. Let’s say one day that EUR 2,000 audit report is valued at only 1 HVN token, the number of tokens versus the price would be regulated by the company as a function of the total revenues of the platform. We are working on delivering a product where the tokens are to be used, and to then buy back treasury tokens as required, since this creates buy side interest; token holders can also be on the sell side or use the tokens on the platform directly for their needs. What's more, token holders who are also liquidity providers will be better informed because they will be able to purchase credit scoring reports and see special deals on the platform. Say, for example, if we were also to implement another layer in the future, with HVN perhaps being accepted as currency in ICOs, the insurance of claims, etc. – as the functionally of the token increases, it would become more valuable, desirable by exchanges and generate more volume. I hope that answers your question

Author: OMuldoon
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I'm not sure if you are aware, but we unveiled our Proof of Concept (PoC) at CoinAgenda Global in Las Vegas last week, hitting yet another milestone on time. The PoC source code has already been deployed to our GitHub, which means that our community now can check out our progress first hand. A link is here: https://github.com/HiveProjectLtd/HivePoC Always looking to refine and improve, we will be finished with an improved beta version of our platform soon and will also post that online in the weeks ahead — for SMEs and investors to try for themselves — creating a large database of all parties involved in the process. With our CEO, Jure Soklic, already having underlined the importance of these efforts for the future growth of our platform and business, our co-founder and CTO, Dejan Jovanovic, will go into further details about all of our PoC work in a forthcoming interview. Dejan will use that opportunity to deal with any lingering questions contributors might have about our PoC and the overall development of the Hive Project Platform.

Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Guys did you see  HIVE just released proof of concept (beta platform)  Don't miss the train on exchanges =)    Led by Hive Project Co-Founder and CTO Dejan Jovanovic, our development team has worked wonders over the last few months. The cornerstone of our success, this high level of performance is set to continue and they deserve an immense amount of credit for their efforts. And, as Dejan has explained to the contributors gathered here in Las Vegas over the past few days, we will be deploying the Hive Project PoC source code to our GitHub in the days ahead — giving our community a chance to check out our progress first hand. Richard Titus, a renowned executive, serial entrepreneur and one of the Wired 100 in 2010, explained in a personal conversation why he is proud to support the project: “I am delighted with Hive Project’s progress! Their PoC announcement demonstrates serious progress into a real business environment and I am convinced they will make a huge difference to global finance.” (Richard D. Titus)  Revealing our short-term plan Now that our Proof of Concept has been unveiled, it is clear that we are now backing up our promises with a real-life business contribution. This only underlines what we have been talking about over the last few months — that we are here to stay and our focus is firmly on the project!  We are also making another leap toward creating a blockchain based liquidity platform for SMEs worldwide by posting our PoC online — for SMEs and investors to try for themselves — creating a large database of all parties involved. This will expedite the progress of our business when our liquidity-providing platform is up and running. Our CTO and Co-Founder, Dejan Jovanovic, will explain more about this and all the details behind our Proof of Concept in the days ahead.  Some final thoughts …  The future is bright. And the evidence is there that we are working as hard as humanly possible to make our platform a reality. Another important milestone has been achieved on time — this is crucial because it proves once again that we are more than capable of keeping our promises. My amazing team and I will continue to do whatever it takes to deliver what everybody expects — a blockchain based platform that gives SMEs fast and low-cost liquidity.  https://medium.com/hiveproject-net/hive-project-premiere-presenting-our-proof-of-concept-ed58417aa3f

Author: OMuldoon
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: We understand where you are coming from. HVN is already listed on HitBTC, Livecoin and EtherDelta, and we are constantly looking to add more exchanges. The best way we can achieve this objective is by getting the new website up and running (which will be done early next week) and presenting the proof of concept by the end of the month. Our marketing efforts in preparation for Q1 2018, when the platform goes live, are focused on our opening markets, which will facilitate Hive's entry. We were just interviewed in the Slovenian media and will be on the panel at Finance newspaper's cryptocurrency conference, which has already boosted our credibility in the region's business world no end. We have also been working hard to get in contact with crypto podcasts and other journalists to better explain to our community our objectives and plans, and the team will be going to CoinAgenda in Las Vegas at the end of the month to help continue to increase the awareness and volumes that all the exchanges expect. So you can see that a lot of effort is being made to push Hive on to even greater heights. We believe that the work we have been putting in will pay dividends, and every member of our team is working flat out to reward our contributors' faith in us. As you would expect, any community is as strong as its weakest link and we would encourage all contributors to join our Telegram channel to discuss and collaborate with the team and the rest of our contributors so that we can all realise our shared objectives together.
