Author: geoneojapan
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I just get email from HIVE!   This is fantastic... time for price rise and support team    Dear supporter!   As Jure stated in his executive update yesterday, we are well on the way to achieving our goal — the creation of a blockchain based liquidity platform for SMEs. With our development team working around the clock to ensure that our proof of concept is finished on time, the rest of the team has been busy nurturing Hive Project’s reputation as a recognized & trusted fintech brand, not only in the cryptocommunity but also in the business world as a whole.  Gaining visibility and respect regionally …    Our team members are continuing to underline their presence as leading names in the industry through increased media exposure (interviews & quotes in the business media), helping to consolidate the increased recognition and respect that Hive Project has already established in the SEE region’s business community.  On 18 October we will continue to develop brand awareness in the region by serving on the panel at a cryptocurrency conference hosted by Finance, Slovenia’s only daily business and financial newspaper. There we will share the stage with other respected fintech and blockchain brands.    … and on the global stage  Following yesterday’s announcement regarding us taking our place among other respected brands and world-class experts at CoinAgenda Global, we have more good news about our presence there. As the last winners of CoinAgenda, we have been allocated a free exhibitor booth at the conference hall, where we will be able to further attract positive attention and global visibility by keeping fintech & cryptocurrency founders, executives & traders up to date with all our latest progress and developments.  Following CoinAgenda in October, we will also be sitting on the panel at The Future of Money & Technology Summit in San Francisco on 4 December. This summit brings together the best and brightest visionaries in the business world, including startup entrepreneurs, developers, press, investors, writers and service and solution providers.  Carving a path as one of the leading new fintech companies, we believe that our participation at these events demonstrates that Hive Project is already a very serious proposition and that our ideas and views on the future of the industry are of great interest to its brightest minds. Taking part will also give us the continued impetus required to ensure Hive Project’s long-term success as the first port of call for small businesses around the world that cannot access the liquidity they need.  And, of course, our new and updated website will also help a great deal to improve our visibility and all-round presence.      It gives us great pleasure to give you a quick sneak preview of our new website. As mentioned, we are focusing on the product itself and addressing SMEs globally. In addition to updating the content, we have also focused on user friendliness and making what we do as simple to understand as possible. We hope you like it.  Our vision remains the same — to help SMEs worldwide manage their financials like a corporation by providing them a blockchain based liquidity platform.    Making it happen — awaiting Monday’s announcement!  In order to achieve our goal of becoming a global business and brand, it is vital to make some strong inroads into the international business world. And our major announcement on Monday will include details about the fantastic addition we are making to the Hive Project in the days ahead.  So, please keep in touch! Talk to us on our Telegram and stay tuned for more great news from Hive Project HQ!  Yours sincerely,  Hive Project Team

Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: hehe  you are looking on wrong channels - you won't get more cheap HVN  look what is team doing right now  and best magazines in country is writing about HIVE.  https://medium.com/hiveproject-net/hive-project-community-update-2-938f12deec9  A lot’s been happening over the last few weeks at Hive Project HQ. To use a bee analogy, the Hive Project Team is definitely buzzing with motivation & excitement about what’s to come.  Ugur Yildirim, Hive Project CFO & Board Member  We cannot stress enough what a major breakthrough it is for Hive Project and our community that Ugur Yildirim will be joining us as our new CFO. As a co-founder and partner of Elements Capital Partners, a firm which specialises in distressed investment opportunities and turnaround cases, Ugur brings over 15 years of investment management experience to the table. A leading figure in the industry, his firm is trusted by global institutional investors and currently manages EUR 800 million of NPL transactions in Eastern Europe, which make him a truly fantastic addition to the core Hive Project Team.  We are actually at a loss for words when it comes to describing how important this addition is to Hive Project, so we will just quote one of the reactions from a contributor on Telegram after the announcement was made:      “Strong leadership is key. Congrats!”  New employees  We have now hired an office manager to run the day-to-day administration duties of the Hive Project team and to book meetings & travel arrangements for conferences. Our communication & support department has also been given a boost, with 2 new employees and 1 intern joining the team.  Our recruitment efforts focused on finding candidates with great communication skills, but also the ability to cover multiple areas quickly should the need arise. We are happy to report that they are already up to speed, assisting in both support & communication roles. The motto of both communication & support teams remains the same:      “Whether it is news, updates or help, our aim is to get those to you faster.”  More content  You can see now first-hand how much content Hive Project Team is currently generating to give you a better & deeper insight into the daily work we do. We will work hard to maintain this pace & bring you more glimpses into life at Hive Project HQ. Hive Project in the news: “SMEs, pay attention. This blockchain platform can save your business!”  Our CEO, Jure Soklic, has been interviewed in today’s edition of Finance, Slovenia’s only daily business and financial newspaper. Here are a few quotes:  “We’re currently finalizing the beta version of the platform,” Soklic explained, “which will be unveiled to the public by the end of the month. The launch of the Hive Project platform, which will help SMEs get the liquidity they need, is on target for the first quarter of 2018.”  “SMEs are at a disadvantage when looking for funding because they cannot take advantage of the same financial instruments as big corporations,” Soklic explained. “However, the Hive Project Platform is a game changer because its full data automation offers a fast track to liquidity for SMEs. The benefits of our platform are its simplicity, speed and full transparency — something that wasn’t available to SMEs in the old economy.”  “We will do everything we can to keep our contributors happy.”  This interview was published as an introduction to Jure Soklic’s panel appearance at Finance’s cryptocurrency conference, which will be taking place on 18 October.      There we will continue to develop brand awareness in the region by sharing the stage with other respected names from the fintech and blockchain industries.  The conference is the prelude to further appearances at CoinAgenda Global in Las Vegas between 24–26 October as well as The Future of Money & Technology Summit in San Francisco on 4 December.

Author: hrbt
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: This is good!  Thanks for cheap HVN's  last few days    It’s been another hard-working week for our team, and we are closing down on completing yet another set of milestones. As Gal wrote yesterday, we have now finalized distribution to our early marketing supporters (bounty campaign) and are giving 100% to achieve our goal — the creation of a blockchain based liquidity platform for SMEs!  As I write this, our UX and design leads are making the finishing touches to our new website — focusing on the product itself and addressing SMEs worldwide. We have updated the content, making it more accessible and understandable to business owners. And last, but not least, we are also working on aesthetics, taking a big step forward for the brand.   BECOMING INDUSTRY LEADERS!  Winning Best ICO of 2017 at CoinAgenda Barcelona gave us high levels of exposure and recognition in the cryptocommunity, and we aim to keep that intact.  As a market leader, our team members will be presenting Hive Project and discussing the future of the industry at a selection of the biggest domestic, regional and global conferences.   I can already announce that we will be on the panel at CoinAgenda GLOBAL in Las Vegas later this month, taking our place among other world-class experts and cryptocurrency founders/executives/traders. We believe that the respect, visibility and presence we have built in the community will work wonders for us all in the long run as Hive Project continues to grow as a global business and brand.  Further announcements will be made in the days and weeks ahead regarding other fintech conferences where Hive Project team members will be attending as panellists and/or presenters.   PRESENTING PROOF OF CONCEPT!  The priority for us now is to deliver a working proof of concept and I am glad to confirm that we are on target for its debut — on the global stage in front of community leaders, cryptocurrency investors and other fintech representatives!   AMAZING ANNOUNCEMENTS COMING SOON!  Seeing our hard-working team in action and what we are achieving on a daily basis, I am surer than ever that the Hive Project will be a resounding long-term success.  Domen, our CMO, will be making some statements later this week regarding our mission to become a global brand, which will precede our main announcement on Monday.  So stay tuned for more great news from Hive Project HQ!

Author: dadonn
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: This is the bane of many projects upon release. Everyone hopes for the 10x on day one and nowadays, smaller exchanges are killing coins. I can think of Oax, Tierion, Zrx, Hive and Monetha have all suffered from this. Some more than others but those were pretty big, relatively high profile ICOs.  The good news is that you didn't get in the ICO, which I didn't, you don't have to pay a monstrous premium. The good and bad news for ICO investors is that obviously the price point isn't there but the good news is that once people dump, whales re-accumulate and the whole price suppression game begins. Plus, the price drop after a big multiple can make coins go dormant. People are still pissed that paid $6 for EOS on day one. It is my hope that the currently great price will be followed by a steady rise commensurate with progress. Which reminds me- I need to go buy some of HVN because you never know when it will take off. Don't think it's going to be very soon but at the end of the day, it's where it can end up that matters.

Author: hrbt
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Why i am buying more undervaluated precious HVN?  Becouse....   A glance at Hive’s future: What’s next? It’s been an exciting journey so far. But now the hard work really begins. Our goal remains clear: to harness the power of blockchain technology to disrupt the invoice financing industry. That is why we have spent the majority of our time offline — working hard to get Hive financing small businesses as soon as possible. We are currently occupied with producing a working proof of concept, moving the company to Switzerland, expanding the team and forming the strategic alliances that will ensure our long-term success.  Exchanges First, we are delighted to confirm that Hive (HVN) is currently listed on two exchanges: HitBTC (https://hitbtc.com/) and Livecoin (https://www.livecoin.net/), and we are proud to report that we have exceeded USD 1 million in a 24-hour period since listing. Since Hive is still in its infancy, we are very proud of these results. More details on the third exchange will be announced within one month.  Token distribution I would also like to comment on the unforeseeable errors that took place during the HVN token distribution process. I can assure you that we, the Hive team, have covered all of the small loss incurred with our funds. Thank you again to those community-minded contributors who returned their double payments. It is actions like this that make us proud to be part of this community. The good news is that the distribution process is now more or less complete. The remaining undistributed tokens are owned by contributors who are focused purely on the long-term and so have yet to provide us with their wallet address. This is why 39.5% of the total token supply remains undistributed. Of this 39.5%, the percentage of funds allocated to the Hive team is now approximately 20%. As previously stated, the founders will not sell our shares (16%) within the next 12 months. In the interests of transparency, these funds will also be transferred into a separate wallet and made available for the public to view.  Communication and cutting the Slack … As already announced, we will be switching communication channels to Telegram soon because Slack has been subjected to too many spam and phishing attempts. As far as the business side of things is concerned, we are currently revamping our website and will launch a better channel for our contributors and token holders to communicate with us. We should be live in 10 days so stay tuned for more updates…  Recruitment As you may have learned from Gal’s most recent update on Slack, we are now in the middle of a global recruitment process for additional new support team members. We understand that we need to do this in order to get our communication with you where it should be. Once we find the right candidates and training is completed, we will then be better positioned to respond to your enquiries quicker. We are also recruiting people in business development, finance and product development. In order to cater for this increase in headcount and the work that lies ahead, we will also be moving from our current premises to a new office that will be able to accommodate our extended team. We want to be clear — you, our community, are one of our top priorities and immensely important to us.  Beta platform We are currently working on the Hive blockchain working Proof of Concept (PoC), which we plan to present to you within the next 4–6 weeks. Through this beta platform, you will be able to get a better understanding of how the smart contract will work, and precisely how Hive and blockchain are set to revolutionise the invoice factoring and financing industries. Please check our white paper here  Milestones We have fielded some queries about where exactly we are in our road map, and can confirm that we are currently on track to meet all of our intended objectives. We do everything within our power to meet our contributors’ expectations. Now that HVN has been listed, we will be steadily working through our stated goals.  Now that you have a financial interest and have contributed to what we are doing, we understand you need to be kept in the loop. We also understand how important it is for your confidence levels that we stick to our stated milestones and show you that we can be trusted to keep our word about the progress we make. If a deadline is missed, however, please do not think the worst. Rest assured that there is always a very good reason for any delay, but that everything remains under control. Again, in the interests of transparency, we will communicate updates on our progress — including any possible delays — clearly and promptly. We understand that you want to know what is going on with the project. But we would like to reassure you that if we are quiet and not responding, it is genuinely because we are working extremely hard to generate the future value we are all waiting for.  Help us help you …  Now, just sit back and relax. As you can see, barring some minor delays, we have fulfilled our promises and are working 24/7 to generate us all the product we all deserve. Help us help you and spread the word about what we are doing here. Perhaps you are a small business owner or know someone who is struggling to find funding. Do they know about blockchain, smart contracts and what we’re doing here at Hive? If not, please let them know! As promised, we are fully on track to commence with funding in Q1 2018.  We are relying on you, our community, to work with us to help push Hive on to even greater heights.

Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: if you forgot    5 reasons to join Hive Project  Here at Hive Project, we have known since the very start that we are all part of something that will revolutionise the financial world. And, yes, it’s a great feeling to be involved in something so special right from the very start.  To help raise awareness and understanding about why you should join us on our quest, we have put together this handy 5-point guide for why you should join us at Hive!  1. Be the first: Hive Project is the first platform to use block chain technology in the invoice financing process, providing SMEs a range of crypto-currency based financing options. We have a head start on everyone else. In a fast moving industry, that is crucial. Join us at Hive Project now and get to the front of the pack!  2. The smart money is on us: Yes, we want to improve SMEs access to liquidity. Yes, we believe that block chain is way to achieve this. And, yes, it will be very satisfying to see this revolution take place. However, our motives are not completely altruistic. There are also significant financial advantages. All contributors will receive Hive tokens (HVN), which will be tradable on the major exchanges and generate a return for their owners. Get your HVN tokens here!  3. Our team: With a wealth of advisory talent with experience in block chain and invoice financing, our strong and experienced team has a long track record of delivering on projects. We can be relied upon to get things done.  4. Help small businesses: Most of us have someone close to them who has been turned down for a small business loan. Probably for no good reason too. Well, now is our chance to help put that right. We give SMEs a previously undreamed range of financing options. Wouldn’t it be satisfying to have played a part in levelling the playing field?  5. Be part of history: The potential for block chain technology in invoice financing is huge. Hive Project is the first and best equipped platform to capitalise on the benefits offered. When you participate in the Hive ICO, not only will you become part of revolutionary platform that solves liquidity problems for SMEs, you will also be involved in a multi-trillion-dollar business with double-digit growth. With Hive Project´s end state being a market place with advance trading analytics for peer to peer lending, our international team of experts and advisers strongly believe, Hive will add value to all contributors. We are convinced that pre-Hive and post-Hive will become common parlance in the invoice financing industry in the years to come — it is a seismic move. Click here now to receive invitation to join Hive Project, the first crypto currency invoice financing platform to provide financial liquidity to small businesses by leveraging blockchain technology.

Author: Jihoy
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I really hate HitBTC, can you guys get listed on some other exchanges, such as Yobit or Novaexchange would be easy to get into  https://novaexchange.com/addcoin/ https://yobit.net/en/addcoin/  Nova you can get in for less than $50, yobit less than $500. I can't even register at HitBTC, and people are reporting withdrawing scamming issues on that exchange. I assume your developers have coins yourself. And difference of exchange can literally means tens of millions of dollars in valuation. You want to put your tokens on a scam exchange then nobody is going to buy it. I assume you didn't create this token for fun, you are actually trying to get high valuation for your business? Get listed on smaller easier to get into exchanges first, get some volume, and then get into larger exchanges. Even if you are a pump and dump scammer with a scamcoin, you still need to push the coins onto a real exchange to be able to cash out. So I don't understand why we aren't listed on a real exchange. Let's get listed ASAP!

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear community of contributors & supporters,  I know it’s been too long, but we wanted to get you as much information as possible.  We’ve included information of both our distribution as well as auditing reports, feel free to read those here!  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: andresmarulanda
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear contributor!      Distribution report — resumption imminent!   While the first HVN tokens were being distributed yesterday, we unfortunately encountered some difficulties with the HVN token distribution process. The highly condensed ETH network had caused a bug to emerge. Upon its discovery, we immediately stopped distribution and began working on finding solutions. Unfortunately, bugs and glitches do happen, sometimes at the most inconvenient of times, but rest assured that all the distributed tokens are here to stay!    Our tech-team has been working around the clock to resolve these issues and ensure that the HVN token distribution process is re-started before 12 noon UTC tomorrow. Once the distribution process has completed, trading will commence as soon as possible thereafter!   Auditing report — The contract is intact!   We recently engaged two independent and highly respected auditors to audit our ERC20 token implementation process: CoInspect (www.coinspect.com) and Netis (www.netis.si).  CoInspect provided a white box security audit and the first round of the audit was completed on 23 August 2017.  The results of the audit revealed: 0 high-risk issues 0 medium-risk issues 2 low-risk issues. Both minor issues were corrected and resubmitted to the auditor. We are now waiting for CoInspect’s official audit report, which we will share with our community.  The Netis audit recorded similarly satisfying results, with only minor tweaks to the code required to satisfy all the criteria set.  Full details about the Hive Project Token implementation can be found at our GitHub repository: (https://github.com/HiveProjectLtd)  Kind regards,    Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear community of contributors and fans,  HVN distribution has begun!  All the contributors who have given us their address before August 28th at 23:59:00 UTC will be getting their HVN tokens today. We have published a new blog post to mark this happy occasion, and you’re welcome to read it here!  We would also like to point out that our ERC20 token code has changed due to security audit recommendations and you can find the new one here!  BOUNTY CAMPAIGN DISTRIBUTION  We have set aside 10,000,000 HVN tokens (2% of the total amount) for several bounties. If you took part in our bounty campaign, we have already contacted you and you have until FRIDAY, 1 September 2017, (10.00 a.m. UTC) to provide us with your HVN token compatible wallet address.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: andresmarulanda
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: "We are delighted to announce that distribution of the HVN tokens began just moments ago! Those of you that provided us with your HVN token compatible wallet address before 28 August (23.59.59 UTC) should already see your HVN tokens. The rest of you will receive your tokens 4 days after your wallet address is confirmed.      Those of you that have not yet provided us with your wallet address, we urge you to do so as soon as possible!   To begin, we will be listing HVN for trade exclusively on HitBTC in order to provide maximum liquidity in one place, making things easier for buyers and sellers. HVN tokens will therefore be tradable as of Friday, 1 September 2017, 10.00 (UTC) on HitBTC —  https://hitbtc.com!     BOUNTY CAMPAIGN DISTRIBUTION  We have set aside 10,000,000 HVN tokens (2% of the total amount) for several bounties. If you took part in our bounty campaign, we have already contacted you and you have until FRIDAY, 1 September 2017, (10.00 a.m. UTC) to provide us with your HVN token compatible wallet address.     Thank you for your support!     Hive Project Team"    Nice

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear community of contributors & friends,  As we’re nearing distribution time though, we would like to have just a final double check that the wallets you have provided are indeed ERC20 token compatible & don’t need the teams working on them to add the HVN to their token list.  Hive Project Team’s suggestion is that you use MyEtherWallet. We suggest you visit this article (https://themerkle.com/top-5-ethereum-wallets-compatible-with-cryptocurrency-ico-tokens/) and check if the wallet you chose is on that list.  If it is not, please contact us at support@hive-project.net, so that we can still change the address you have provided us.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Best regards

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hey electronicash,  here's a short response we've posted a while ago.  Quote from: hiveproject_net on June 10, 2017, 07:35:39 AM Quote from: termion on June 10, 2017, 01:57:04 AM https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1866936 Once more invoice platform? Populous - FIRST.  Hi termion,  I will treat your post as a question of the difference between Hive Project & Populous. If I understand correctly, Populous´s aim is to become invoice exchange platform, where you can buy & sell invoices.  However, Hive Project is aiming at something different: Hive Project uses invoice factoring to get the invoice entry into the system. We will first provide the initial credit score by evaluating publicly available historical data on the business. In the first stage of Hive Project platform, we will create a Hive fund that will itself lend to small businesses. That will also enable us to gather more data on the business  In the beginning, we expect the credit rating to be less accurate because we’ll have less data to work with. Therefore we will be lending smaller amounts with more commission to fine-tune the algorithm & historical data in order to be able to lend higher value with less commission expenses.  The next step will be to provide you with historical data & credit rating system to enable peer to peer lending like an exchange, but the end goal for us for Hive Project to become an ecosystem for credit scoring of the companies and 3rd party auditing. Populous aims to be the invoice exchange.  To kickstart our journey, we will have the Hive Project Fund buying invoices in crypto, however later on, it will be an ecosystem with data offered to the market.  Also, another note: as you are well aware, in the end everybody decides for themselves what ICO to invest in. We believe we have a strong team with good background in finance to be able to deliver on what we've promised. No matter what you decide to invest in - Hive Project, Populous, both or something completely unrelated - we wish you the best of luck.  Hive Project Team    Also, we'd like to point to some of the differences that we believe would make us a good project to contribute to:  a) we’re digitizing an existing business & part of Hive Project team has restructured a bank with its own factoring house after the 08-09 financial crash  b) we have HVNX, Hive Project Invoice Financing Fund start buying the invoices, simulating the buyer side of the market to avoid a chicken or egg problem of new marketplace. Populous doesn’t have that as far as we know.  c) our go-to-market strategy with ERP/invoice issuing software integration targets SME owners in an environment they know & use every day, vs. convincing them to join yet another marketplace/platform.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hey,  my name is Gal Jakic & I'm the Community Manager at Hive Project. I'm really sorry we haven't been answering your questions on BTC Talk lately. It was an honest mistake as we were dealing with a higher then usual traffic on Slack & support e-mails. I won't be making excuses - it was my f*ck-up   I hope you guys & girls can forgive us for it.  On to the long overdue answers to your questions.  Let me first answer all of you wondering about the bounties. a) As explained in our ICO bounties Medium post , bounties will be distributed post ICO. It will probably be at the same time as Hive Project's token distribution - so August 24th. b) For those who are asking about spreadsheets, we have repeatedly stated in this thread & all other communications that the spreadsheets will be internal-use only. We understand your worries, but primarily it was a decision done based on privacy of bounty participants & we will not change this decision until the end of ICO. If you're worried, please use the bounties@hive-project.net mail to check. c) You'll be contacted by Hive Project Team & will provide us with an address where you'd like your bounty HVN to go. HVN token is ERC20 token standard compatible, so any ETH address should be fine. d) ICO bounty campaign runs until the end of ICO, so until August 14th at 8PM UTC time.  I'll be answering specific questions below, so that I can quote all of you asking us something concrete.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Quote from: Bitekojn on August 05, 2017, 09:45:39 AM I agree with huanglui. No sign of devs for days. For the company that won the best ico 2017 at Coinagenda is definitly not good.  Sorry guys,  it was not our intention to go MIA in the middle of all this.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hey to all,  in case Hive Project doesn't reach minimum - which is highly unlikely at this point - we will return the contributions to contributors & continue our talks with VCs & private investors.  It would be better for both the company & contributors if ICO is a successful one. As well if contributors provide liquidity pool for HVNX (that is Hive Project's Invoice Financing Fund, which we blogged about here!), it is a great way to provide a good long-term value & benefits for token holders.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Body: Hey huanglui,  we have decided on a longer ICO period to have a larger number of contributors vs a whale-driven market with fast dump scenario. Also, we are currently in discussions with a company that works with ICO companies to keep their token listed & volumes at normal.  Token buyback mechanics will be used to share part of profits from HVNX, Hive Project Invoice Financing Fund with contributors & token holders. How often these will be is TBD, but it's a priority that the yields generated are good for token holders.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hey whoareyou4,  If I understand correctly, Populous´s aim is to become invoice exchange platform, where you can buy & sell invoices.  However, Hive Project is aiming at something different: Hive Project uses invoice factoring to get the invoice entry into the system. We will first provide the initial credit score by evaluating publicly available historical data on the business. In the first stage of Hive Project platform, we will create a Hive fund that will itself lend to small businesses. That will also enable us to gather more data on the business  In the beginning, we expect the credit rating to be less accurate because we’ll have less data to work with. Therefore we will be lending smaller amounts with more commission to fine-tune the algorithm & historical data in order to be able to lend higher value with less commission expenses.  The next step will be to provide you with historical data & credit rating system to enable peer to peer lending like an exchange, but the end goal for us for Hive Project to become an ecosystem for credit scoring of the companies and 3rd party auditing. Populous aims to be the invoice exchange.  To kickstart our journey, we will have the Hive Project Fund buying invoices in crypto, however later on, it will be an ecosystem with data offered to the market.  As far as the "first mover" advantage, we believe we have a very strong team, both in terms of financial & tech background. Also Hive Project Fund will offer an advantage as new platforms often face the "chicken or egg problem", where one side of the market is underrepresented. Hive Project Fund will facilitate the funding for SMEs, bringing the SMEs to the platform & making the credit scoring algorithm accurate enough for peer-to-peer stage.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hey a4si,  please subscribe to our e-mail list at http://hive-project.net. We're sending out e-mail invitations for pre-sale to all the users who've subscribed after our pre-sale start 3 times a day.  As far as the buying & selling part goes: in the e-mail you'll be invited to register on our website & after logging into your dashboard, you'll recieve a personalized ETH & BTC addresses you can send your contribution to. After the transaction is cleared, you'll recieve an e-mail from Hive Project, confirming we have recieved your contribution. Allow up to 30 minutes for ETH transaction to be cleared & up to 2h for BTC, although it usually is cleared faster then that. You'll be able to see the transaction you've sent in your dashboard. I'll quote our post from a little earlier below, because some users are having problems seeing their transactions in dashboard:  Quote from: hiveproject_net on June 21, 2017, 10:30:36 PM Quote from: adam1230 on June 21, 2017, 01:55:33 PM Quote from: Trustor on June 21, 2017, 07:36:02 AM I just invested in the Pre-Sale, good work devs   I just invested as well. Has your dashboard updated yet? I have 26 confirmations so far but no update.  EDIT: after 40 confirmations it shows up on my dashboard. Excited about this one  Hey adam1230,  I hope your issue has now been resolved. Sometimes, there are problems with cookies, so logging in and out usually solves it. If not, just write to us at support@hive-project.net & we'll help you troubleshoot.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team  Within 30 days of successful ICO, you'll receive your HVN tokens & be able to see them in the dashboard. From there you'll be able to transfer them to a wallet or exchange you choose.  We'll list the exchanges in due time, as we understand it is a very important thing to know for the contributors, so it is automatically a team priority for us. We're talking to some of the big exchanges now, but we're not releasing any information about it yet, as we wouldn't want to then have to retract any of them from the list if anything changes.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: cryptohome
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Guys,  Noob here.  I am from finance background and know the real pains of waiting to be paid and think leveraging the invoice financing is brilliant.  I am confused about the difference between Hive project and Populous.  Both are claiming to be the first in the Invoice Finance space.  Are they both planning to do same thing or is there actual difference in the offerings?   Anyone shed some light?  Thank you for your time...

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hey cryptohome,  If I understand correctly, Populous´s aim is to become invoice exchange platform, where you can buy & sell invoices.  However, Hive Project is aiming at something different: Hive Project uses invoice factoring to get the invoice entry into the system. We will first provide the initial credit score by evaluating publicly available historical data on the business. In the first stage of Hive Project platform, we will create a Hive fund that will itself lend to small businesses. That will also enable us to gather more data on the business  In the beginning, we expect the credit rating to be less accurate because we’ll have less data to work with. Therefore we will be lending smaller amounts with more commission to fine-tune the algorithm & historical data in order to be able to lend higher value with less commission expenses.  The next step will be to provide you with historical data & credit rating system to enable peer to peer lending like an exchange, but the end goal for us for Hive Project to become an ecosystem for credit scoring of the companies and 3rd party auditing. Populous aims to be the invoice exchange.  To kickstart our journey, we will have the Hive Project Fund buying invoices in crypto, however later on, it will be an ecosystem with data offered to the market.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Body: Hey xcajun21,  thank you for your question. What you put in the field depends on whether you're applying with a personal Facebook account or as an owner of Facebook page. Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hey jrussell,  in my understanding of Iconomi's DAA, you give your money to Iconomi & they invest it across different cryptocurrency projects to disperse your investment risks.  In contrast, Hive Project platform enables owners of SMEs to sell their invoices to solve their liquidity problems. Let's say you have a business that sells a sports shoe materials to Nike. They order a lot, but you only get your money in 30/90/120 days. With Hive Project platform, Hive Project Fund buys your invoice for a little less then what Nike would pay you the next day. Then in 30/90/120 days, Nike pays Hive Project Fund the money they originally owed you. Your business has liquidity (to make payroll, buy new materials, outsource your new shoe design, etc) & grow faster without the fear of financial problems.  But we're not done yet. Hive Project Fund is only the first step of the project. We will feed all the financial data we get on the business to an algorithm, that will get more accurate at credit scoring businesses with every invoice. The second step is peer-to-peer lending. Essentially that means you'll use a HVN token to buy an invoice & financial data on businesses involved from Hive Project & then you'll be able to pay business X a discounted invoice rate & receive a full payment in 30/90/120 days.  Hive Project's end goal is to become the source of credit scoring & 3rd party audit data.  Please feel free to ask any further questions, we're here to help & hopefully, change the future of SME liquidity together.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hi kezy,  we will direct a large part of the money to establish Hive Project Fund, that will be buying the invoices from businesses to refine the algorithm & provide a good credit scoring system for Hive Project platform users in the peer-to-peer lending stage. As the Hive Project Fund will take the data from publicly available sources & have no history of doing business with an SME, our credit scoring will be less accurate in the beginning. We have to provide the algorithm a lot of data (i.e. a lot of invoices) to supply accurate results to our users, interested in buying the invoices.  You can find the distribution of funds on our website, if you'd like to know more. Also feel free to ask more questions if there is any additional information you're interested in.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: We sign our posts Hive Project Team as it is a team effort, but my name is Gal Jakic & I am the Community Manager @ Hive Project. I mostly take care of our BitcoinTalk posts, but I'd like the team effort to be recognized in everything we do, because we bring value to the community as a collection, not the individual participants.  Tom Sperry is associated with the project as described on our website. His reputation speaks for itself, same as our teams. People can check out every one of us, our aim is to provide SMEs with opportunity to work better and our investors with the opportunity for great investment. I'd also like to point out that Mr. Sperry's involvement with the project is he is the escrow, so he holds part of the cryptographic key needed to issue the funds to the Hive Project Team.  A name is everything we have & none of us have the intention of damaging it.  We've also checked the website links & realized there was an issue with linking to Tom's website. Sadly, as a founder, owner & lead developer of a web design agency, I can tell you these things happen sometimes. We should have been more careful in checking those links. When creating work for our clients, it's usually the clients that check, but when you make a website for yourself, sometimes these things get lost in the myriad of other things you have to do when preparing for the ICO.  Thanks for pointing out our issues. As you can see, we react immediately on issues of our community & hopefully it shows.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: virasog
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: I am not understanding the tech here.  How does any of this differ from the blockchain that is there now and a side token that is created off of it?  It seems that all of the information that your token provides is just the same information that is already there, but in a different format.  I am not arguing , just trying to fully understand where this is going.

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hi virasog, our project is not creating another blockchain. We’re using an already existing infrastructure to create Hive Project platform that will help SMEs with their liquidity problems. Let’s say a business X has a customer, who will pay him for his services, but he will only receive the money for his work in 120 days. The SMEs would of course need his money immediately - for making payroll, buying materials, etc. Hive Project platform will  develop a fund, that will buy that invoice at a discounted rate & provide the SME with the money the next day, while waiting for the original customer to pay us the original amount in 120 days. Blockchain is an integral part of the platform needed for keeping reliable track record of invoices, which helps with automating process and prevents double selling of the invoices. Plus it will, in the future, also enable big data credit scoring.  HVN token’s value is therefore tied to the business we’re creating & is the means for payment for usage of some of the features of the Hive Project platform (in our case, you will need the HVN token to be able to buy an invoice from Hive Project platform in the peer-to-peer lending stage). To put it in very simple language, buying an invoice from business X at a discounted price now, so that their customer, business Y can pay you the full invoice amount at payment deadline - let’s say 120 days from now - will cost you X amount of HVN tokens, which you either own if you’re an investor or have to buy from someone who does at an exchange.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

As does your plan to buy discounted debts as third party interlopers. If you knew about contract law and the intervention of third parties, you would know that such debts become unenforceable. If you buy the debt, it has been paid. Do you have a contract with the debtor? No? Then they don't have to pay.  But wait, perhaps Mr Muldoon might not be a bad guy banker after all. Because I can't find any sign him working at the BoA online. I'll check with them after the weekend though, just to be sure.  I can however find him hawking pear brandy and olive oil for a company that came and went without leaving a trace. A bit of a come down for Mr Banker, perhaps he didn't meet his repossession targets. Never mind, he soon got a job as an attaché at the British Embassy in Slovenia, escorting Prince Andrew and the like. He gets about this fella. Pretty sure the folks at the embassy will remember this chap.  http://www.standard.co.uk/lifestyle/foodanddrink/the-spirits-high-on-holy-water-9015310.html  http://barmagazine.co.uk/slovenian-monks-launch-their-pear-brandy-in-uk/  https://kitschyn.wordpress.com/2013/10/02/slovenian-olive-oil-no-longer-a-secret/  https://www.finance.si/8356288?cctest&  But wait, there's more. What if he's none of the above? What if he's  . .  A film producer!  https://www.slated.com/people/74470/  http://www.goydetectiveandthegentlemanpimp.com  That's right folks, he making a movie. There's just no stopping this guy! What next for Mr Miracle?  Bitcoins. That's what.

Body: Hi, its great that you point out stuff you believe is important and want more data on. We understand there is a lot of projects with unknown credentials and certainly we don´t want to be seen as one.  Oliver Muldoon is a senior member of our team and has worked on many things in his life. It's not a secret that he has worked on all the things you pointed out, although he never worked as an attache. He worked for the General Secretariat of the Slovenian government. I don't see this as a issue, but rather as an asset.  He is an accomplished professional with a wide range of experience and a strong financial background.  I am sure if our team had any intention to deceive anyone, first we would not have a team of this size, many of whom have previously worked for Iconomi, Bitstamp and many other well known companies, and I am sure no one would accept this work if anything wasn't right here.  We hope you can see us as a real team with pure intention to create a value for our investors. Regarding technical details, we will publish more in the blog that is on the way and should be published early next week.

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Dear ajpa94, thank you for a great question. Hive Project Team has laid out a strong development schedule for the following 2 years, that you can check out on our website. It is a very strict set of deadlines & the funds for lending to SMEs will not be released to the Hive Project Team unless those deadlines are fully respected. That is guaranteed by our escrow & it is why we have one holder of the escrow key, who is not a team member, but a respected authority in the IT & VC community holding that key & keeping us accountable.  The reason we need the 2000 Bitcoin minimum is, that big part of the money will be used to start the Hive Project fund, that will start buying invoices & in the process, acquiring financial data on the SMEs themselves & feeding it to the algorithm, to be able to reach Hive Project’s end goal - become a 3rd party audit & credit score provider. The nice side effect is that the more SMEs we help reach liquidity, more accurate our credit scoring algorithm will be in terms of providing investors & token holders a good credit score for the peer-to-peer lending phase of the Hive Project platform.  Kind regards,  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Also, you can expect a detailed blog post, explaining how the money raised during Hive Project ICO will be used in development of Hive Project platform, on our Medium blog in a few days.

Author: NewWorldCoiner
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Proof buddy, not empty words.  It says attaché at the British Embassy in the first link. It's quite clear. It even mentions his duties. Are we to put the discrepancy down to journalistic interpretation, or has your head of finance been economic with the truth?  I suggest you provide proof of Mr Muldoon's AVP positions at the Bank of America, and his time at the British Embassy, or wherever it was that he working when he was escorting Prince Andrew. Also that Tom Sperry is indeed providing escrow service. And I mean concrete, verifiable evidence, not just words on a forum. I'll be checking in the morning, and if it doesn't check out I will be reporting your lovely ICO to all the necessary authorities.  You may well have genuine, honest individuals on your team. I couldn't say, I haven't checked anyone else out. But I know conmen have to employ devs if they want to get in on the crypto scams. And without proof that everyone is who they say they are, what can I say? It all looks too familiar.   Gonna need more than a whitepaper for 10,000 bitcoins.

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hi termion,  I will treat your post as a question of the difference between Hive Project & Populous. If I understand correctly, Populous´s aim is to become invoice exchange platform, where you can buy & sell invoices.  However, Hive Project is aiming at something different: Hive Project uses invoice factoring to get the invoice entry into the system. We will first provide the initial credit score by evaluating publicly available historical data on the business. In the first stage of Hive Project platform, we will create a Hive fund that will itself lend to small businesses. That will also enable us to gather more data on the business  In the beginning, we expect the credit rating to be less accurate because we’ll have less data to work with. Therefore we will be lending smaller amounts with more commission to fine-tune the algorithm & historical data in order to be able to lend higher value with less commission expenses.  The next step will be to provide you with historical data & credit rating system to enable peer to peer lending like an exchange, but the end goal for us for Hive Project to become an ecosystem for credit scoring of the companies and 3rd party auditing. Populous aims to be the invoice exchange.  To kickstart our journey, we will have the Hive Project Fund buying invoices in crypto, however later on, it will be an ecosystem with data offered to the market.  Also, another note: as you are well aware, in the end everybody decides for themselves what ICO to invest in. We believe we have a strong team with good background in finance to be able to deliver on what we've promised. No matter what you decide to invest in - Hive Project, Populous, both or something completely unrelated - we wish you the best of luck.  Hive Project Team

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Hiveterminal | Your auditor, risk manager and liquidity broker on the same platform WEBSITE -BLOG -FACEBOOK -TWITTER -REDDIT -TELEGRAM  Hive Project is now Hiveterminal  The Token The Hiveterminal token (HVN) is an ERC-20 token and is currently powered by the Ethereum blockchain network   Description Hiveterminal is a blockchain-based platform that offers a peer-to-peer bridge between small businesses and liquidity. By applying blockchain technology to factoring, the Hiveterminal (www.hiveterminal.com) creates a distributed and highly efficient public ledger to open up new sources of finance to SMEs. This innovation enables businesses to automate the invoicing process, bringing the benefits of blockchain technology closer to commercialization – and biting into the global invoice financing market, which surpassed EUR 3 trillion in annual volume this year.   Tech summary Every issued invoice is put on blockchain via automatic ERP connectors Full and irreversible traceability of invoices (ownership, due date, payment, etc.) makes them tradable assets. Statistical risk assessments using big data collected from the blockchain. Decentralised system where a permissioned blockchain replaces the trusted third party. Security: all data for each invoice is encrypted and secured with a private key. Company purpose Providing liquidity on small business market and create a central database of invoices available for scoring and auditing. We are bridging the liquidity gap for SMEs and the assessment gap for quick credibility checks on companies. Our technology also facilitates rapid and real time auditing.  Business Roadmap Summary  Conferences and Events  Exchanges  Read our blogs: Progress to date The Hive Project's mission is to provide SMEs with the liquidity they need The solution: blockchain What is invoice financing and why is blockchain the missing link? The first crypto currency invoice financing platform to be launched! GDPR and its impact on your blockchain project — a case study Email us: General inquires: info@hiveterminal.com Technical support: support@hiveterminal.com

Author: sarul
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: Glad to see a new project begin again on this year. Is this based ethereum or waves platform? What about the unsold token during ICO?

Author: hiveproject_net
Title: [ANN] - HIVETERMINAL - Blockchain based invoice financing platform
Body: It's ERC20 compatible token. Feel free to read our whitepaper here!  As far as the the number of tokens is concerned, the money we raise during the ICO will be divided 500 000 000 tokens accoring to the formula (so number of raised money in BTC & ETH divided by 500 000 000 tokens). One coin's initial value is therefore determined by the amount of money raised & is then tied to the business proposal we're putting forward, to help SMEs with invoice financing.
